revision.text:
[[File:Wailmerpail.png|thumb]] == Details == ===Description=== This is a tool for watering [[Berries]] you planted to make them grow more quickly ===Acquisition=== Completing Route 13 or Route 15, Whichever is done first ===Effects=== You can now access the [[Farm]] on the corner of Route 14 and Route 15 {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
